title: Cetaphil face wipes revealed as Amazon top seller must-have beauty product after massive sales spike
text:
Online giant Amazon has just revealed Cetaphil cleansing cloths is one of its top-selling beauty products.

The $8 item earned the ranking after it was revealed sales have spiked by a massive 94,000 per cent.

Cetaphil's Gentle Skin Cleansing Cloths were rated for their selling power along with a plethora of other beauty buys on Amazon's list of Movers and Shakers.

The popular make up wipes, developed by a leading dermatologist, are also available at Australian pharmacy chain Priceline.

Cetaphil's cleansing cloths (pictured) have been revealed as an Amazon top seller

What sets Cetaphil's products apart from others similar is they've been created especially for those with sensitive skin.

The brand, known for its best-selling face wash, ensures its formulas are fragrance-free, non-comedogenic and pH balanced.

Products which are non-comedogenic use ingredients that are not likely to promote the clogging of pores.

Face wipes are an easy and convenient way to remove make up without the need for a range of products (stock image)

The fragrance-free wipes also guarantee they won't strip the skin of natural protective oils or emollients and are gentle enough for daily use.

The cleansing cloths, priced at $8 for a pack of 25, currently hold a four-out-of-five star rating on Priceline's website.

Those who've used the affordable skincare item and left reviews have claimed the results are excellent.

Those who've used the make up wipes have said they're 'very good for sensitive skin as they don't have any harsh chemicals'

'Very good for sensitive skin as they don't have any harsh chemicals in them. Good for taking makeup off and just cleaning in general. Would recommend,' wrote one ser.

'I've been through so many different brands for make up wipes and so far these are the most gentle on my skin,' said another.

While one person simply stated it 'removes all the yucky stuff'.

'I use these before I wash my face with Cetaphil so it takes most of the makeup on my face and it does it perfectly.'
description: Online giant Amazon has just revealed one of its top-selling beauty products, after the item has seen a 94,000 per cent spike in sales. The cleansing cloths are available at Priceline.
authors: Emilia Mazza For Daily Mail Australia
